_source.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
_source.long_desc: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.
_source.pricing_details:
The starter plan is free with 100 form submissions per month that can be stretched to 200 on the free plan. If you need more submissions the price starts from $24/month, with a discount for yearly payments. 

Bronze - $24/month
Silver - $29/month
Gold - $79/month
_source.target_audience: Whether you run a business, nonprofit, or work in education or healthcare, Jotform makes it easy to collect and manage information. Receive payments, registrations, appointments, uploads, and more.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Abbreviation Detection
category_features.definition: Automatically comprehend data abbreviation terms

category_features.name: Data Capture and Transfer
category_features.definition: Collecting data and sharing/storing in another location

category_features.name: Data Quality Control
category_features.definition: Process for different types of data to be checked for accuracy

category_features.name: Data Replication
category_features.definition: Process of copying and storing data

category_features.name: Data Retrieval
category_features.definition: Obtaining data from a database management system

category_features.name: Image Capture
category_features.definition: Process images and automatically scan for data

category_features.name: Mis-Keyed Variation Detection
category_features.definition: Detects when a user has input/keyed data incorrectly

category_features.name: Phonetic Variation Detection
category_features.definition: Detects variations in pronunciation or variations in spelling across regions.

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Authentication
category_features.definition: Determine/verify the signature (who signed it)

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and repurpose formatting

category_features.name: Data Security
category_features.definition: Protect digital privacy and secure data

category_features.name: Document Analytics
category_features.definition: View statistics and metrics about a document on a dashboard or by exporting a file

category_features.name: Document Storage
category_features.definition: Store documents in a centralized location for easy access

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Mobile Signature Capture
category_features.definition: Capture a signature via a mobile device

category_features.name: Multi-Party Signing
category_features.definition: Share documents to multiple users to collect multiple signatures in a serial, parallel or combination order.

category_features.name: Reminders
category_features.definition: Set notifications to remind users when to view and sign documents

category_features.name: Task Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Measurement and reporting of task milestones

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: CRF Tracking
category_features.definition: Collect and track all case report forms (CRFs) within a centralized repository

category_features.name: Clinical Study Management
category_features.definition: Tools to manage single or multiple clinical studies within a centralized platform

category_features.name: Data Capture and Transfer
category_features.definition: Import, collect, and capture data from multiple sources

category_features.name: Data Verification
category_features.definition: Process of checking different types of data for accuracy to avoid errors or inconsistencies

category_features.name: Distributed Capture
category_features.definition: Uses decentralized resources such as network scanners, multi-function devices (MFD), and desktop scanners to collect data and documents

category_features.name: Document Classification
category_features.definition: Tag documents so that they may be searched via those tags

category_features.name: Document Imaging
category_features.definition: Convert paper files into digital images

category_features.name: Forms Management
category_features.definition: Organize, store and distribute forms and form templates in a centralized location

category_features.name: Remote Data Capture
category_features.definition: Capture data electronically

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Regulate who can view and use the system by setting permissions and issuing passwords

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

similar_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.

pricing_plans.name: Silver
pricing_plans.description: The Silver plan includes up to 50 forms, 2500 monthly submissions, and 10 GBs of available space.

pricing_plans.name: Gold
pricing_plans.description: The Gold plan includes up to 100 forms, 10,000 monthly submissions, and 100 GBs of available space.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.custom_price: Please contact Jotform directly for Enterprise pricing

pricing_plans.name: Starter
pricing_plans.description: The Starter plan includes up to 5 forms, 100 monthly submissions, and 100 MBs of available space.

pricing_plans.name: Bronze
pricing_plans.description: The Starter plan includes up to 25 forms, 1000 monthly submissions, and 1 GBs of available space.

_source.short_desc: Collect and organize project data with custom online forms that work with 100+ apps and an all-in-one spreadsheet-powered database.
_source.long_desc: Meet your goals and deadlines faster with online forms and surveys you can assign directly to your teammates. Jotform makes it easier than ever to collect important data, project files, internal requests, and more without back-and-forth emails. Automate your workflow by connecting your forms to 100+ apps and creating an automated approval flow to respond to submissions fast. Increase your team's efficiency while saving time and paper with Jotform.
_source.pricing_details:
The starter plan is free with 100 form submissions per month that can be stretched to 200 on the free plan. If you need more submissions the price starts from $24/month, with a discount for yearly payments. 

Bronze - $24/month
Silver - $29/month
Gold - $79/month
_source.target_audience: Whether you run a business, nonprofit, or work in education or healthcare, Jotform makes it easy to collect and manage information. Receive payments, registrations, appointments, uploads, and more.

category_features.definition: Management of stored documents(how long they should be stored, what to do after)

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Store rarely used documents into a more compressed form, usually in a separate location

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Document Classification
category_features.definition: Tag documents so that they may be searched via those tags

category_features.name: Document Generation
category_features.definition: Custom forms to streamline repetitious aspects of a document

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: File Conversion
category_features.definition: Change a document from one file type to another

category_features.name: File Recovery
category_features.definition: Recover lost, deleted, or damaged files

category_features.name: Offline Access
category_features.definition: Sync important data to your mobile devices to use the software and its features without internet access

category_features.name: Optical Character Recognition
category_features.definition: Conversion of typed, handwritten, or printed text images into computer text

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (i.e. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Dispatch Management
category_features.definition: Manage sending personnel and resources to a site as needed

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Online Time Clock
category_features.definition: Track/log the amount of time employees worked per job

category_features.name: Payment Collection in the Field
category_features.definition: Swipe a credit card or manually process payments while with the customer in the field

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Generate quotes and estimates forms to send to customers

category_features.name: Routing
category_features.definition: Provide directions and plan the day's work to optimize employee scheduling

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Service History
category_features.definition: Track work performed and resources used for past customers, sites, or assets

category_features.name: Work Order Management
category_features.definition: Create work orders and track their status to completion

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Document Classification
category_features.definition: Tag documents so that they may be searched via those tags

category_features.name: Document Generation
category_features.definition: Custom forms to streamline repetitious aspects of a document

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Version Control

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is where project management happens. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered.

related_products.short_desc: Trello is an intuitive project management tool that creates a shared perspective for your team across the entirety of any project.
related_products.features: Trello is an intuitively simple project management tool, built so users can spend more time getting things done and less time learning how to use this tool. Teams that use Trello can easily organize their work and manage projects from beginning to end: assign tasks, manage due dates, attach files, create checklists, and more. With over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira, and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub for cross-team collaboration.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by millions, Basecamp puts everything you need to get work done in one place.
related_products.features: 89% of our customers say they have a better handle on their business since switching to Basecamp. It bring *everything* you're working together with *all* the tools teams need to get projects done: to-do lists, message boards, schedules, documents & file storage, and group chat. Everyone will know what to do. Nothing will slip through the cracks. You'll always know exactly whats going on.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project.
related_products.features: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project. Teams can start with a project template or create their own custom workflow. Jira issues, also known as tasks, tracks each piece of work that passes through the workflow steps to completion. Jira's automation engine enables teams to easily automate tasks and processes. With all project information in one place, reports can also be generated to track progress, productivity and ensure nothing slips.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a project management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: GitHub enables development teams to collaborate, and review and manage code within a DevOps pipeline and built-in code security.
related_products.features: GitHub is where the world builds software. Millions of individuals, organizations and businesses around the world use GitHub to discover, share, and contribute software. Developers at startups to Fortune 50 companies use GitHub, every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Manage projects with time tracking, scheduling, budgeting, planning and reporting options in one software available across devices.
related_products.features: Overseeing progress of a project, tracking employees' workload, budgeting and tracking time spent is simple with Clockify. There are no limits on the number of users, projects or time tracking periods. You can invite an infinite number of users to your workspace, approve timesheets & manage schedules. Create invoices, track expenses, control budgets and hourly rates. Generate customized reports, export and share them with clients. Track leaves and holidays and approve time off for your employees

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the world's leading project management tool with fully customizable and proprietary features that make it a must-have.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Manage all of your team's projects in one place with monday.com--customizable software that adapts to your organization's needs.
related_products.features: Manage all of your team's projects in one place with monday.com. From simple tasks to complex portfolios, this all-in-one software solution allows you to build your team's perfect collaboration tools. Then integrate your other tools; visualize data in calendar, Gantt, or Kanban views; and automate your manual processes. So you can truly take control of all of your workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Confluence makes project management easier. Keep track of milestones and timelines all in one place.
related_products.features: Confluence makes Project Management easier. Use it to track your most complex tasks, keep stakeholders in the loop, and collaborate with all participating team members.  Confluence pages help track project milestones in an organized and concise way. Work better, together with Confluence.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkOtter is "Your #1 Rated PPM for Usability in 2022" - Garnter.  Gantt, Kanban, Resource Mgt, JIRA Sync, MSP Sync, & Magic Dashboards
similar_products.features:
WorkOtter is "the #1 Rated Project & Resource Management Solution for Usability: ~ Gartner May 2022. 

Best for PMOs of 10 or more in Engineering/IT/Innovation ready to move from spreadsheets to easy SaaS project, resource, and portfolios maangement. 

Differentiator:  Unlike Monday, Smartsheet, and Planview you can plan resources at the project level (vs Task).

Top Features: Magic Dashboards, Portfolios (with What-If), Intake, Projects (Gantt/Kanban), Time, Capacity Planning, and Financials.

Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: Wrike is versatile project management software for any team, with templates, Gantt charts, automated requests and reports, and more.
similar_products.features: Tackle complex projects with Wrike's award-winning project management software. Break projects into simple steps, assign tasks to team members, and visualize progress with Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and calendars. Manage resource allocation and forecasting with software that's easy to launch. Automation and AI features strip away time-consuming admin tasks so you can do the best work of your life. Streamline your practices, align your team, and ensure you hit deadlines and stay on budget.

similar_products.features: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project. Jira's automation engine enables teams to easily automate tasks and processes. With all project information in one place, reports can also be generated to track progress, productivity and ensure nothing slips.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildertrend is the No. 1 construction project management software, trusted by homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors.
similar_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

similar_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a no-code operational agility platform that enables organizations to improve operations through insights and automation.
similar_products.features: Quickbase is the easiest way to manage projects in the cloud no matter what the project is or where your teams are. Quickbase's flexible no-code platform gives you all the features you need to assign tasks, automate workflows, and generate insightful reports for even the most complex projects.

similar_products.short_desc: A completely reimagined UI, enhanced search and filters, easywork allocation, new portfolio dashboard, and more to transform your work.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Projects is a cloud based project management software with over 200,000 customers worldwide. It helps you plan your projects, and execute them with perfection. 

With Projects, you can assign tasks easily, communicate effectively with both your team and clients, be informed on all project updates, get detailed reports on work progress and deliver projects on time, everytime.

similar_products.short_desc: Trello is an intuitive project management tool that creates a shared perspective for your team across the entirety of any project.
similar_products.features: Trello is an intuitively simple project management tool, built so users can spend more time getting things done and less time learning how to use this tool. Teams that use Trello can easily organize their work and manage projects from beginning to end: assign tasks, manage due dates, attach files, create checklists, and more. With over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira, and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub for cross-team collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping companies plan, execute, and deliver great work and exceptional customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. With Workfront, organizations can manage projects and portfolios with precision using features like task and resource management, capacity planning, Gantt charts, and time tracking. This enables teams to set and meet expectations while minimizing effort, eliminating redundancies, and optimizing delivery on time and budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Visual Planning is a full-scale  Project Management platform configured with project managers in mind. Sign up for a free demo!
similar_products.features: Visual Planning is a full-scale scheduling and project management platform configured with project managers in mind. Monitor employee capacities/skillsets, project statuses, tasks & more with Visual Planning's popular scheduling tools.  Oversee reports, projects, and resources across all devices for a collaborative management platform. Tailor a solution that meets your company's needs.  Sign up for a free custom demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest consulting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
similar_products.features: **Leader in Project Management Software by G2** Track the things that are important to you. Deep dive into project tasks and budgets. Check the status of tasks by due dates, staff assignments and more. If you're operating blind, real-time visibility is a few clicks away and exactly the way you want to see it. "We looked everywhere...nothing beats BigTime" - Matt M.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Client Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Client Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Client Onboarding Software (also known as Customer Onboarding Software) brings clients through the process of learning and implementing a recently purchased product or service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Idea Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Idea Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Idea Management software provides all employees or members of an organization with a platform for sharing ideas to benefit the organizational mission. This type of software allows companies to solicit information and encourage a collaborative environment for employees. Additionally, vendors, partners, customers and investors can share ideas, allowing companies to collect, sort, and evaluate ideas from the outside workforce, often with strategic goals in mind. Idea Management software is related to Project Management software, Workflow Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Project Management software is used by corporate IT teams and project managers to track task assignments, expenses, and progress of application development, maintenance, and deployment.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Professional Services Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Professional Services Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Professional Services Automation (PSA) software enables the tracking, planning, management and billing of services provided by independent contractors and services organizations. Professional Services Automation applications help to streamline individual projects, prevent loss of revenue and slow billing cycles and manage governance. PSA solutions give an overall view of finances, operations and client relationships, enabling a more efficient organization. Professional Services Automation software is related to Project Management software, Time and Expense software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Portfolio Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Portfolio Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Portfolio Management software makes it easier for project mangers and organizations to analyze and manage numerous projects simultaneously. Project Portfolio Management software helps you allocate resources across projects, and collaborate between project teams. It is designed to help administrators collectively monitor project goals and view reports for multiple projects in one place. Other categories related to Project Portfolio Management software include Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Resource Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Requirements Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Requirements Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Requirements Management software helps companies align practical needs with IT functionality during the systems development or upgrade process. By managing system requirements, companies can shorten development time and optimize the quality of their systems. Requirements Management software usually covers hardware, software, functional, operational, interface, business and security requirements. Requirements Management software is related to Workflow Management software, Server Management software, Project Management software, Website Monitoring software, and Business Process Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Resource Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Resource Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Resource Management software helps project planners allocate program resources. Project managers often use Resource Management software to analyze resource demand and capacity, to create predictive project forecasting. Businesses looking for Resource Management software may also be interested in Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, and Project Portfolio Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Task Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Task Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Task Management software allows groups of users to work together more cohesively to quickly and thoroughly complete projects. Features such as time tracking and project tracking ensure that all project tasks are covered and progress reports are up to date. Other functions include automatic time budgeting and timeline, email syncing, to-do list creation, collaborative interfaces for all users, and task reminders. Task Management software is related to Project Management software, Idea Management software, Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Team Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Team Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Team Management software utilizes integrated communication capabilities and project/task management functionality to assist managers with improving collaboration, communication, and productivity within teams and team-related projects, whether remotely or in the office.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.

pricing_plans.name: Silver
pricing_plans.description: The Silver plan includes up to 50 forms, 2500 monthly submissions, and 10 GBs of available space.

pricing_plans.name: Gold
pricing_plans.description: The Gold plan includes up to 100 forms, 10,000 monthly submissions, and 100 GBs of available space.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.custom_price: Please contact Jotform directly for Enterprise pricing

pricing_plans.name: Starter
pricing_plans.description: The Starter plan includes up to 5 forms, 100 monthly submissions, and 100 MBs of available space.

pricing_plans.name: Bronze
pricing_plans.description: The Starter plan includes up to 25 forms, 1000 monthly submissions, and 1 GBs of available space.
